summary_raw:
Twyne introduces a non-custodial, risk-modular credit delegation protocol that optimizes capital efficiency in DeFi lending by allowing Credit LPs to delegate unused borrowing power to active borrowers. The protocol enables higher leverage through a dual-LTV framework and credit reservation invariants, while utilizing internal liquidations to minimize market impact and preserve capital.

The user wants a 3-4 sentence summary of the provided technical whitepaper.
The summary must focus on the main innovation.
